name: Alphonse (CastimierDev)
description:
Working Title: Alphonse is a game made for The 9th Pirate Software Game Jam.

It is A Simple Text Based Rogue Like game where you play as an alchemist trying to become a GOD, but for a price..

The Theme was: Sacrifice Is Strength

You will have to choose events and perform alchemy in order to become stronger. But when you aren't experienced enough some things might go wrong!

Once you think you are strong enough, you have the ability to Challenge GOD and if you are able to win... YOU will be GOD!

If you find any bugs or other things that don't work, please send a message to CastimierDev#6222 on Discord.

Credits:

Concept: Kurmit3011 & CastimierDev

Events: Kurmit3011

Programming: CastimierDev

Audio: Kurmit301

NOTICE: THE LINUX AND MAC VERSIONS AREN'T TESTED
